summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Qiray Hair Ties For Women Coil Hair Ties,Large Lace Phnom Penh,5 Colors 10 Pieces. Review Date: 2020/08/24 Store: Qiray Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Form': 'elastic', 'Brand': 'Qiray', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches', 'Number of Pieces': '10', 'Product Dimensions': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'UPC': '655160582486'} Review Text: Very pretty, they have a good stretch depending you your hairstyle you may twist twice. You get two of each color. The only thing I did not like is that these hair ties have a paint smell to them so wash them before wearing them. Review Title: Good Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: STYLEAGAL Portable Electric Nail Drill, Manicure Pedicure Drill Kit Professional nail starter kit for beginners acrylic with drill（2020 Upgraded） Review Date: 2020/09/06 Store: styleagal Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'styleagal', 'Voltage': '5 Volts', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 4.5 x 2 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '782913461771', 'Manufacturer': 'STYLEAGAL'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:c1d81e3cfad618ed65e971a49ab65264]] This is a nice drill great for beginners. Just take some practice to get good at using it on your self and others hand. The power cord is not long enough and the drill bits is hard to push them in and to pull out. If you have never used a drill start working with the lower speed first. Review Title: Works very well Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Pretty Frank Natural Deodorant Jar- No Aluminum Deodorant for Women, Men, Teens, & Kids – Paraben Sulfate Free Cream Deodorant with Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Vitamin E & Baking Soda (Jasmine) Review Date: 2020/09/09 Store: PRETTY FRANK Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'PRETTY FRANK', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Scent': 'Jasmine, Coconut', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '3.42 x 2.79 x 2.59 inches; 5.61 Ounces'} Review Text: I like the fact that its organic and made in the US. However, this is not a deodorant for someone who is on the move. I do have sweaty underarms and I had to clean my armpits and apply this several times a day to be dry. I don't like that I have to put this on with my fingers. I was dry long as I wasn't moving around to much and in a cool place. The jasmine scent is wonderful. It is a small jar but you get a lot. Review Title: Not for me Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: YsesoAi 28 Pcs Hair Curlers Spiral Curls No Heat Wave Hair Curlers Styling Kit Spiral Hair Curlers Magic Hair Rollers with 2 Pieces Styling Hooks for Most Kinds of Hairstyles (20 cm/ 7.8 inches) Review Date: 2020/09/24 Store: YsesoAi Average Rating: 3.2 Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Brand': 'YsesoAi', 'Color': 'Pink, Blue, Ivory, Yellow, Green', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '1.5 x 1.7 x 1.1 inches', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '1.5 x 1.7 x 1.1 inches; 6.38 Ounces', 'UPC': '745895771436'} Review Text: My hair is naturally curly so , I wanted to see how it would do on a blowout. I like the curly pattern that it creates the only problem I had was my hair was to long for this, pulling your hair threw with the hook that's given was easy. It did not hurt to pull your hair threw the spiral curlers. Review Title: Short Hair Only Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: AMAJULIE Non Slip Flexible Silicon Wigs Fix Strong Hold Comfort Silicone Lace Wig Grip Transparent Headband Hair Band Adjustable for Lace Wigs (Light Brown) Review Date: 2020/09/26 Store: AMAJULIE Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Material': 'Silicone', 'Fabric Type': 'Silicone,Silicon,Lace', 'Brand': 'AMAJULIE', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '3.98 x 2.28 x 0.55 inches; 0.88 Ounces', 'UPC': '192389741275'} Review Text: I love this thing, it's very comfortable and has nice snug fit. It's not to tight and the ridges are on the top and bottom so it stays on your head and grips the lace on the wig. You don't see the grip under your lace, this thing really keeps your wig on. You must be wearing a Lace Front wig for it to work. Review Title: My new friend Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Glitter Poly Nail Gel Extensions Builder Gel UV/LED Soak Off Acrylic Fashion Gel Polish Set for Nails Beginner DIY Nail Art at Home 8 colors-15g (Pink series) Review Date: 2020/11/03 Store: MIZHSE Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'MIZHSE', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '478.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '9', 'Package Dimensions': '9.76 x 4.88 x 1.42 inches; 12.8 Ounces'} Review Text: This kit only comes with the poly gel, nail forms and a free gift. You will need your own tools to apply. I love this formula, very easy work with it doesn’t dry fast so you have to build or layer. What I like the most that after putting under the lamp your nails don’t have that tacky layer. So the poly gel is sheer but building as in adding more will make it thicker. I also like the nail forms. Review Title: The best I’ve used so far Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 7pcs Pearl Hair Clips Large Hair Clips Pins Barrette Ties Hair Headwear Barrette for Party Wedding Daily, Gift for Girls and Women Review Date: 2020/11/09 Store: MEETWIN Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.5 x 3.5 x 0.2 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '723668014119'} Review Text: These are very pretty to jazz up your hairstyle. I love the big clips very easy to open and close also holds a of hair. None of the pearls were scratch or peeling. Definitely worth getting. Review Title: Beautiful Pearl accessories Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Curly Girl Hair Spray Bottle – Ultra Fine Extended Water Mister for Curly Hairstyling, Care and Moisturizing (10 Fl. Oz. & 24 Fl. Oz Set, Swirls White Top) Review Date: 2020/11/28 Store: Curly Girl Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Curly Girl', 'Color': 'Swirls White Top', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Package Dimensions': '11.06 x 6.14 x 3.39 inches; 6.74 Ounces', 'UPC': '853356005850', 'Manufacturer': 'Curly Girl'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:7fc8bfe19a29a244cf5bea86c34ad870]] I absolutely love this bottle. With the mist spray water isn’t dripping everywhere. I don’t have to keep refilling it up every day like I do with the regular spray bottle. Every easy to use just fill up with water put on the nozzle and spray where you like. Review Title: Every curly hair girl or guy needs this! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Short Bob Wig Human Hair Pixie Cut Wigs Natural Color Lace Wigs 100% Virgin Huam Hair Lace Front Side Part Wigs for Women Review Date: 2021/01/22 Store: MarchQueen Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Glueless', 'Brand': 'MarchQueen', 'Package Dimensions': '12.64 x 8.86 x 2.05 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '779303841725'} Review Text: Such a cute wig the hair wasn't soft as I thought it was be but its very nice. Earrings and wig cap came with the bob wig, no smell, lightweight, and little to no shedding. Very easy to install nice short cut cute for a quick look on the go and or summer style. Review Title: So Cute ! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: JIADEL Gel Nail Polish Colors Set,Confetti Glitter Gel Nail Polish With No Wipe Base and Top Coat,Soak Off UV LED Nail Art Salon Starter Manicure Kit Review Date: 2021/03/07 Store: JIADEL Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'JIADEL', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Number of Items': '16', 'Liquid Volume': '0.17 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '11 x 9 x 1 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '11 x 9 x 1 inches; 1.34 Pounds', 'UPC': '642940399488'} Review Text: Packaging is nice love how the bottles shows what color of the polish your picking. Nice color glitter polish however they are not long lasting. I did my nails in both matte and gloss look and within two days my nails with the gloss top coat peeled off. My base and top coat bottles were relabeled so I don't know if that had something to do with it or not. The nail polish is thick because the glitter so you will need to give it a good shake or tap it a bit in your palm. Review Title: Nice colors very small bottles Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 6 Packs Butterfly Locs Crochet Hair 12 Inch Short Bob Distressed Locs Crochet Braids Pre Looped Faux Locs Crochet Hair for Women Pre twisted Synthetic Braiding Hair Extensions (#1B/27) Review Date: 2021/03/27 Store: M-BOX Average Rating: 3.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'M-BOX', 'Extension Length': '12 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Installation Type': 'Sew-In', 'Package Dimensions': '11.81 x 10.24 x 3.35 inches; 1.21 Pounds', 'UPC': '717373471985'} Review Text: I love that the hair is wrapped nice and tight come with enough packs to do a full head. This hair soft, lightweight, and very light smell. These locs were very hard to install because the loops were not done good, the loops are supper small and short. When trying to make to loop bigger to pass the loc through, the loop came undone. And by the loops being this way it took me a full day to install because I struggled pulling the locs through the tiny loops. Also was making the locs unravel. Review Title: Wrapped tight but small loops Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Maestee 9 Pcs Gel Nail Polish Kit, 6 Colors (8ml) with Base and Top Coat and Matte Top Gel (8ml) Nail Polish Hot Modern Muse Collection Soak Off Nail Gel Polish Starter Professional Kit Best Mothers Day Gift Review Date: 2021/07/06 Store: maestee Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'maestee', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Matte,Glossy', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '9', 'Number of Pieces': '9', 'Liquid Volume': '0.27 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '11.69 x 3.66 x 1.42 inches; 14.07 Ounces'} Review Text: Nice looking set colors are beautiful. All though I love the colors, the formula needs some re-working.
When applying the base coat it began separating on my nail like it had oil in it. My nails didn't last longer than two days before it started to lift and peel. Review Title: Nice colors formula needs some work Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: QIUTIMIY 18 Pack Pearl Hair Pins for Bridal Wedding Women Hair Jewelry Accessories, with Clear Container Review Date: 2021/07/14 Store: QIUTIMIY Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'QIUTIMIY', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Color': 'Clear', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Embellishment': 'Pearl', 'Package Dimensions': '6.69 x 4.33 x 1.1 inches; 2.08 Ounces'} Review Text: Simple and classy these pearl hair pins are great for any occasion. I used these pins for my birthday hairstyle with a crown. Very easy to put in and easy to take out and they didn't hurt ether. Review Title: Beautiful hair pins Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details: 1. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked. 2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked. 3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects. I love the big clips very easy to open and close also holds a of hair. None of the pearls were scratch or peeling. Definitely worth getting. Review Title: Beautiful Pearl accessories Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Curly Girl Hair Spray Bottle – Ultra Fine Extended Water Mister for Curly Hairstyling, Care and Moisturizing (10 Fl. Oz. & 24 Fl. Oz Set, Swirls White Top) Review Date: 2020/11/28 Store: Curly Girl Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Curly Girl', 'Color': 'Swirls White Top', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Package Dimensions': '11.06 x 6.14 x 3.39 inches; 6.74 Ounces', 'UPC': '853356005850', 'Manufacturer': 'Curly Girl'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:7fc8bfe19a29a244cf5bea86c34ad870]] I absolutely love this bottle. With the mist spray water isn’t dripping everywhere. I don’t have to keep refilling it up every day like I do with the regular spray bottle. Every easy to use just fill up with water put on the nozzle and spray where you like. Review Title: Every curly hair girl or guy needs this! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Short Bob Wig Human Hair Pixie Cut Wigs Natural Color Lace Wigs 100% Virgin Huam Hair Lace Front Side Part Wigs for Women Review Date: 2021/01/22 Store: MarchQueen Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Glueless', 'Brand': 'MarchQueen', 'Package Dimensions': '12.64 x 8.86 x 2.05 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '779303841725'} Review Text: Such a cute wig the hair wasn't soft as I thought it was be but its very nice. Earrings and wig cap came with the bob wig, no smell, lightweight, and little to no shedding. Very easy to install nice short cut cute for a quick look on the go and or summer style. Review Title: So Cute ! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: JIADEL Gel Nail Polish Colors Set,Confetti Glitter Gel Nail Polish With No Wipe Base and Top Coat,Soak Off UV LED Nail Art Salon Starter Manicure Kit Review Date: 2021/03/07 Store: JIADEL Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'JIADEL', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Number of Items': '16', 'Liquid Volume': '0.17 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '11 x 9 x 1 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '11 x 9 x 1 inches; 1.34 Pounds', 'UPC': '642940399488'} Review Text: Packaging is nice love how the bottles shows what color of the polish your picking. Nice color glitter polish however they are not long lasting. I did my nails in both matte and gloss look and within two days my nails with the gloss top coat peeled off. My base and top coat bottles were relabeled so I don't know if that had something to do with it or not. The nail polish is thick because the glitter so you will need to give it a good shake or tap it a bit in your palm. Review Title: Nice colors very small bottles Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 6 Packs Butterfly Locs Crochet Hair 12 Inch Short Bob Distressed Locs Crochet Braids Pre Looped Faux Locs Crochet Hair for Women Pre twisted Synthetic Braiding Hair Extensions (#1B/27) Review Date: 2021/03/27 Store: M-BOX Average Rating: 3.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'M-BOX', 'Extension Length': '12 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Installation Type': 'Sew-In', 'Package Dimensions': '11.81 x 10.24 x 3.35 inches; 1.21 Pounds', 'UPC': '717373471985'} Review Text: I love that the hair is wrapped nice and tight come with enough packs to do a full head. This hair soft, lightweight, and very light smell. These locs were very hard to install because the loops were not done good, the loops are supper small and short. When trying to make to loop bigger to pass the loc through, the loop came undone. And by the loops being this way it took me a full day to install because I struggled pulling the locs through the tiny loops. Also was making the locs unravel. Review Title: Wrapped tight but small loops Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Maestee 9 Pcs Gel Nail Polish Kit, 6 Colors (8ml) with Base and Top Coat and Matte Top Gel (8ml) Nail Polish Hot Modern Muse Collection Soak Off Nail Gel Polish Starter Professional Kit Best Mothers Day Gift Review Date: 2021/07/06 Store: maestee Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'maestee', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Matte,Glossy', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '9', 'Number of Pieces': '9', 'Liquid Volume': '0.27 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '11.69 x 3.66 x 1.42 inches; 14.07 Ounces'} Review Text: Nice looking set colors are beautiful. All though I love the colors, the formula needs some re-working.
When applying the base coat it began separating on my nail like it had oil in it. My nails didn't last longer than two days before it started to lift and peel. Review Title: Nice colors formula needs some work Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: QIUTIMIY 18 Pack Pearl Hair Pins for Bridal Wedding Women Hair Jewelry Accessories, with Clear Container Review Date: 2021/07/14 Store: QIUTIMIY Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'QIUTIMIY', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Color': 'Clear', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Embellishment': 'Pearl', 'Package Dimensions': '6.69 x 4.33 x 1.1 inches; 2.08 Ounces'} Review Text: Simple and classy these pearl hair pins are great for any occasion. I used these pins for my birthday hairstyle with a crown. Very easy to put in and easy to take out and they didn't hurt ether. Review Title: Beautiful hair pins Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- Format your response exactly as follows: POSITIVE SUMMARY: [Your positive summary here] NEGATIVE SUMMARY: [Your negative summary here] OVERALL SUMMARY: [Your overall summary here]
raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:  
The user has expressed high satisfaction with multiple products, highlighting their aesthetic appeal and practicality. Many items like hair accessories and tools received praise for their attractive design and ease of use. Several users appreciated the effectiveness and pleasant scents of personal care items, specifically noting organic ingredients and the product’s performance. Key positives included comfortable fittings, good elasticity, beautiful visuals, and solid functionality, with several products being described as “easy to use” or “perfect for beginners.” The user demonstrated a consistent preference for items that combined style and usability, making it clear that they value both aesthetics and practicality in their purchases.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:  
Despite generally positive reviews, some products did not meet the user’s expectations. Notable complaints included issues with product functionality, such as difficulties with grip and installation, particularly for hair accessories, indicating a struggle with design flaws. The user also expressed dissatisfaction with a few personal care products, mentioning the need for frequent reapplications and undesirable scents. Critiques focused on the durability of nail products, citing peeling and lifting shortly after application. Overall, negative experiences reflected concerns around practicality and longevity, suggesting that some items did not deliver value for money.

OVERALL SUMMARY:  
The user's shopping history reflects a mix of delightful finds and some disappointments. Positive experiences were common, characterized by a preference for visually appealing, well-designed accessories and effective personal care items. Satisfaction levels highlighted the user’s appreciation for quality and usability. However, several reviews pointed to frustrating issues around product performance and durability, particularly concerning hair accessories and nail products. This balance indicates a discerning buyer who values both aesthetic appeal and functional effectiveness but has encountered challenges that impacted their overall satisfaction with certain purchases.

target_interaction.title: Not for sensitive skin
target_interaction.text:
This mask does not work like the ads show.! Very easy to apply and starts drying quick.
This is not for sensitive skin when in 2 minutes my left cheek started to burn so I washed it off with water and then with my face wash. I would not get, its not fast results like the ads say, its more like it will work over time.
target_interaction.title_meta: 2PCS Green Tea Purifying Clay Stick Mask, Face Moisturizes Oil Control, Deep Clean Pore, Improves Skin
